description: This file defines an API client for a Learning Management System (LMS) backend, providing functions to fetch lessons, skills, progress, quizzes, media generation, and handle API URL construction and error handling.

methods.name: __buildApiUrl
methods.description: Constructs a full API URL based on the base URL and provided path.

methods.name: safeJson
methods.description: Safely parses JSON response, returns null on failure.

methods.name: responseToError
methods.description: Converts an HTTP response to an Error object with detailed message and payload.

methods.name: jsonFetch
methods.description: Performs a fetch request with JSON handling and consistent error shaping.

methods.name: listLessons
methods.description: Fetches the list of lessons from the backend.

methods.name: listSkills
methods.description: Fetches a list of skills with optional search parameters.

methods.name: getSkill
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific skill by ID.

methods.name: getSkillProgress
methods.description: Retrieves progress for a specific skill.

methods.name: updateSkillProgress
methods.description: Updates progress for a specific skill.

methods.name: getLesson
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific lesson.

methods.name: enrollLesson
methods.description: Enrolls the user in a specific lesson.

methods.name: getProgress
methods.description: Fetches user progress, optionally filtered by user ID.

methods.name: getQuiz
methods.description: Retrieves quiz data for a lesson.

methods.name: submitQuiz
methods.description: Submits quiz answers for a lesson.

methods.name: generateLesson
methods.description: Generates a new lesson based on a seed.

methods.name: generateMedia
methods.description: Generates media content based on type and prompt.

methods.name: __apiDiagnostics
methods.description: Provides diagnostic information about the API base URL and CORS guidance.
